contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox airport | name = South Cariboo Regional Airport | nativename = <small>108 Mile Airport</small> | nativename-a = <small>South Cariboo/108 Mile Airport</small> | IATA = ZMH | ICAO = CZML | type = Public | owner =[[Cariboo Regional District, British Columbia|Cariboo Regional District]] | operator = Nick's Rag and Tube | city-served = | location = [[108 Mile Ranch, British Columbia]] | elevation-f = 3,129 | latd = 51 | latm = 44 | lats = 12 | latNS = N | longd= 121 | longm= 19 | longs= 58 | longEW= W | coordinates_region = CA-BC | pushpin_map = Canada British Columbia | pushpin_label = CZML | pushpin_map_caption = Location in British Columbia | website = [http://www.cariboord.bc.ca/Services/Airports/SouthCaribooRegionalAirport.aspx www.cariboord.bc.ca/...] | r1-number = 15/33 | r1-length-f = 5,293 | r1-surface = [[Asphalt]] | footnotes = Source: [[Canada Flight Supplement]]<ref name="CFS">{{CFS}}</ref> }} '''South Cariboo Regional Airport''' or '''108 Mile Ranch Airport''' {{Airport codes|ZMH|CZML}} is a registered [[aerodrome]] located {{convert|5.3|NM|lk=in}} northwest of [[108 Mile Ranch, British Columbia|108 Mile Ranch]], [[British Columbia]], [[Canada]]. The airport is the regional aerodrome for the South [[Cariboo Regional District, British Columbia|Cariboo Regional District]], handling over 2,000 movements a year. It provides facilities for commercial passenger service, [[MEDEVAC]], [[flight training]] and corporate traffic.<ref name= Airport-Data>{{cite web|url=http://www.airport-data.com/world-airports/CZML-ZMH/|title=Information of South Cariboo Regional Airport (108 Mile Ranch Airport)|publisher=Airport-Data.com}}</ref> ==Facilities and aircraft== '''South Cariboo Regional Airport''' contains one [[asphalt]] paved [[runway]]. *Runway 15/33 measuring {{Convert|5293|x|75|ft|abbr=on|0}} In 2011, the airport had a total of 963 plane arrivals and departures; 72 of these were medevacs. The airport is located within walking distance of two resorts and an 18 hole PGA golf course.<ref name= "South Cariboo Regional Airport">{{cite web|url=http://southcaribooregionalairport.com/|title=South Cariboo Regional Airport|publisher=South Cariboo Regional Airport|accessdate=17, January 2013}}</ref> ==Events== Each year, the airport hosts Airport Day. This event was created for locals to enjoy aviation activities and learn more about the aviation industry and, in particular, the airport as a valuable south Cariboo asset.<ref name= "Cariboo Regional District">{{cite web|url=http://www.cariboord.bc.ca/Services/Airports/SouthCaribooRegionalAirport.aspx|title=South Cariboo Regional Airport|publisher=Cariboo Regional District}}</ref> ==References== <references/> ==External links== *[http://www.cariboord.bc.ca/Services/Airports/SouthCaribooRegionalAirport.aspx South Cariboo Regional Airport] at [[Cariboo Regional District, British Columbia|Cariboo Regional District]] website *[http://www.108ranch.com/108airport.html 108 Mile Ranch Airport] at [[108 Mile Ranch]] Community Association website {{List of airports in Canada}} [[Category:Registered aerodromes in British Columbia]] [[Category:Cariboo Regional District]] {{BritishColumbia-airport-stub}}
